name: The Pilot Studio
about: The Pilot Studio, located at Isla Grande Airport in San Juan, Puerto Rico, is a premier flight training academy dedicated to preparing the next generation of pilots. With a commitment to excellence, the school offers comprehensive flight training, tailored ground and flight instruction, and state-of-the-art facilities. Experienced instructors and a modern aircraft fleet ensure students receive top-notch education. The Pilot Studio provides various training programs, including Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, and Instrument Flight Training, as well as aircraft rentals and online theory courses. International students are welcome, with requirements including an M-1 student visa and TSA clearance. The school operates 24/7 for flight operations, making it a flexible and supportive environment for aspiring aviators to achieve their aviation goals. The Pilot Studio is your destination for quality education and hands-on experience in the skies.
